location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 2 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Marine Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter informs the Bombay Marine Department that the carpenters stationed at Bushire desire to return to Bombay, as they have been there for two years. It therefore requests that they are relieved at an early opportunity.
